Question: Are the trousers blue or red?

Reference Answer: The trousers are red.

Image path: ./sampled_GQA/2383075.jpg

Program:

```
BOX0=LOC(image=IMAGE,object='trousers')
IMAGE0=CROP(image=IMAGE,box=BOX0)
ANSWER0=VQA(image=IMAGE0,question='What color are the trousers?')
ANSWER1=EVAL(expr="'blue' if {ANSWER0} == 'blue' else 'red'")
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER1)
```
Rationale:

<hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>BOX0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>LOC</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>image</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">, <b><span style='color: darkorange;'>object</span></b>='trousers')=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,"></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>IMAGE0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>CROP</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>bbox</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">)=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,"></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>VQA</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>image</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">,&nbsp;<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>question</span></b>='What color are the trousers?')=<b><span style='color: green;'>red</span></b></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER1</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>EVAL</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>expression</span></b>="'blue' if ANSWER0 == 'blue' else 'red'")=<b><span style='color: red;'>EVAL</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>expression</span></b>="'blue' if 'red' == 'blue' else 'red'")=<b><span style='color: green;'>red</span></b></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: red;'>RESULT</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER1</span></b> -> <b><span style='color: green;'>red</span></b></div><hr>

Answer: red
